title: Kyly Clarke wears a glittering crown with cricketer husband Michael at The Everest races
text:
It was a star-studded day at Sydney's Royal Randwick racecourse on Saturday.

Celebrities in their masses turned out in their best ensembles to attend The Everest 2019 in Sydney.

And among the glitterati was Kyly Clarke, who had her husband, cricketer Michael Clarke, in tow.

Call her queen bee! Kyly Clarke (right) wore a glittering crown as she enjoyed a date with cricketer husband Michael Clarke (left) at The Everest 2019 in Randwick on Saturday

The 38-year-old shared a number of photos of her outfit, plus a handful from the event, to her Instagram and Instagram Stories.

Kyly opted for an eye-catching neon orange dress with a one-shoulder design.

It featured a ruched bow detail at the shoulder, and clung to the candle maker's slim form.

Stunner! Kyly opted for an eye-catching neon orange dress with a one-shoulder design. Atop her head was a dainty tiara featuring golden and clear rhinestones

Atop her head was a dainty tiara featuring golden and clear rhinestones that sat high among her brunette waves.

The beauty carried a YSL bag in black leather with a gold chain strap and wore embellished black heels.

For makeup, she opted for a coral lipstick in a matte formula, and a hint of peachy blush which matched her rust-toned eye-shadow.

Cute! The beauty carried a YSL bag in black leather with a gold chain strap and wore embellished black heels

Details: Her dress featured a ruched bow detail at the shoulder, and clung to the candle maker's slim form

Her chunky wedding and engagement rings sparkled on the day, and she wore a pair of dangly pearl earrings.

Meanwhile, Michael looked slick in a navy suit with a baby blue shirt underneath.

He wore a smart dark blue tie and finished his look with a pair of gold and black aviator sunglasses.
